mutants.code:
import re

def contains_double_characters(input_string: str) -> bool:
    """
    Determines whether the input string contains double characters (including whitespace characters).
    
    Parameters:
    input_string (str): The string to be checked.
    
    Returns:
    bool: True if the string contains double characters, False otherwise.
    """
    return bool(re.search('', input_string.lower()))
